g.text: Covert Ops
The Operative has discovered a {{data.token.title.toLowerCase()}} in
{{data.token.territory.title}} and must attempt to defeat it.
A {{data.token.title.toLowerCase()}} placed in
{{data.token.territory.title}} has succeeded.
• Secret Agents throw two dice against traps and discard
the higher roll.
• {{data.operative && data.operative.meepleTitle}} throw one die against traps.
• The Operative's strength will go down by the amount rolled.
• The Operative currently has a strength of {{data.operative && data.operative.strength}}.
• If the Operative's strength goes to zero they will be dead until
their next turn and the Terrorist will receive {{viktoryPoints(3)}}.
• Special Forces throw two dice against recruiting cells and
discard the higher roll.
• {{data.operative && data.operative.meepleTitle}} throw one die against recruiting cells.
• This recruiting cell will be destroyed on a roll of 1-3.
• This recruiting cell will be activated on a roll of 4-6 and the
Terrorist will receive {{data.token.territory.recruitStrengthPoints()}} strength points (maxing out at 12).
• On a roll of 6 the Operative is also killed, remaining dead until
thier next turn, and the Terrorist will receive {{viktoryPoints(1)}}.
• Bomb Squad throw two dice against bombs and discard
the higher roll.
• {{data.operative && data.operative.meepleTitle}} throw one die against bombs.
• This bomb will be defused on a roll of 1-3.
• This bomb will explode on a roll of 4-6 and the Terrorist will
receive {{viktoryPoints(data.token.territory.bombViktoryPoints())}}.
• On a roll of 6 the Operative is also killed, remaining dead until
thier next turn, and the Terrorist will receive 1 additional
{{viktoryPoints()}}.
The trap was defeated. The Operative's
strength went down by {{rolls && rolls[0]}} to {{ data.operative && data.operative.strength}}.
The trap was successful and the Operative
killed, earning The Terrorist {{viktoryPoints(1)}}.
The Terrorist now has {{viktoryPoints(data.token.team.viktoryPoints)}}.
The recruiting cell was defeated.
The recruiting cell was successfull, giving the Terrorist
{{data.token.territory.recruitStrengthPoints()}} strength points, bringing their strength to {{data.token.team.strength}}.
The Operative was killed, earning the Terrorist {{viktoryPoints(1)}}.
The Terrorist now has {{viktoryPoints(data.token.team.viktoryPoints)}}.
The bomb was defused.
The bomb exploded, giving the Terrorist {{viktoryPoints(data.token.territory.bombViktoryPoints())}}.
The Operative survived the explosion.
The Operative was killed in the explosion, giving
the Terrorist 1 extra {{viktoryPoints()}}.
The Terrorist now has {{viktoryPoints(data.token.team.viktoryPoints)}}.
The trap did not catch any Operatives.
The recruiting cell was successfull, giving the Terrorist {{data.token.territory.recruitStrengthPoints()}} strength points
bringing their strength to {{data.token.team.strength}}.
The bomb exploded, giving the Terrorist {{viktoryPoints(data.token.territory.bombViktoryPoints())}}.
The Terrorist now has {{viktoryPoints(data.token.team.viktoryPoints)}}.
{{data.operative && data.operative.tokenRollStrength(data.token)===2 ? "Roll Two Dice" : "Roll One Die"}}
{{data.operative && data.operative.isDead() ? "Done" : "Next"}}
"Next"
